Social And Cultural Activities: (i) Vice President, California`s Kannada community organization;(ii) Won first prize in national and state level inter-collegiate cartoon competitions;and (iii) Published cartoons in state, national and international publications and newspapers
Literary Artistic & Scientific Accomplis: (i) Editor-in-Chief for a California`s Annual literary magazine; (ii)Designed and illustrated cover pages for several books and publications; (iii)Published engineering articles in IEEE, IETE, CDC publications; (iv) issued and pending US patents in engineering and technology areas
Special Interests: (i) Electronics product design and development to solve common man`s problems (ii) Mechanisation of Indian Agriculture to improve productivity (iii) Reformation of education system
Educational Qualifications: M.E.(Electrical Communication Engineering) Educated at Indian Institute of Science(IISc), Bangalore, Karnataka
